column4: QUESTION: in terminal i execute 'sudo ndiswrapper -i bcmwl5.inf'.. output is 'driver bcmwl5 is already installed'... i then run 'ndiswrapper -l'... output shows 'bcmwl5 : invalid driver!'... how do i fix this problem and install my wireless card drivers?... PM WITH ANSWER, THANK YOU.
what it means is that the driver you have installed now (which is installed, by the way) is the wrong one for your card
